document.title: Other Project Items
document.paragraph:
The Other Project Items folder in an EiffelEnvision ../project.xmlProject is designed to store arbitary project related items, that are not specific to the project itself.
in_this_section
2 In This Section
other_project_items.xml Other Project Items Folder
An explaination of the Other Project Items folder and its function within an EiffelEnvision project.
context_menu.xml Other Project Items Context Menu
The Other Project Items folder context menu.
virtual_folders.xml Virtual Folders
A brief overview of the Virtual Folder found under Other Project Items.
generic_file_items.xml Generic File Items
A overview of the generic file items found under Other Project Items.
